calendar-overview.delete-description: Are you sure you want to delete this calendar?
calendar-overview.edit-description: Edit the details of your calendar below.
calendar-overview.title: Calendar title

calendar-create.title: Create Calendar
calendar-create.people-description: Invite others to collaborate on a shared agenda for collective time management.
calendar-create.date-range-description: For temporal agendas (projects for example), choose YES and you can define the start + end dates for it. For normal ones, just keep it at NO.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Access all notifications in one place. To delete a notification, simply click on it and a delete button will appear.
notifications.clickOnCircle: You can change the colors by clicking on the circle.

sharing-hub.title: Sharing Hub
sharing-hub.description: Manage how your data is shared and integrated. Access settings and options for sharing information with other users or services.

time-blocking.title: Add time block
time-blocking.description: Reserve specific time slots for designated purposes, such as standard work hours or personal activities, ensuring they remain unoccupied.

permissions.title: Collaborator permissions
permissions.description: Adjust the access permissions for invited members of this agenda.

inspiration.description: Welcome to the Inspiration Hub! Here, your assistant offers personalized motivation, creative ideas, and productivity tips to make your days more inspiring and fulfilling.
inspiration.placeholder: What do you want to talk about?
